item.text: K: I didn't really get that.

K: I didn't really get that. @David can you, please fork the page and elaborate please? You seem to get it better than I do. It comes across as relevant to the application of bc in social simulation in games.

K: I didn't really get that. @David can you, please fork the page and elaborate please? You seem to get it better than I do. It comes across as relevant to the application of bc in social simulation in games, it is also about democracy, and relevant to liquid democracy, more than proof of work is. May be not.

story.text: K: I didn't really get that. @David can you, please fork the page and elaborate please? You seem to get it better than I do. It comes across as relevant to the application of bc in social simulation in games, it is also about democracy, and relevant to liquid democracy, more than proof of work is. May be not.
